forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become a mixture of wintry precipitation overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow mixed in the evening. Then mix of wintry precipitation in the overnight hours. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.
